This repository is all the code I utilized for my dissertation Aim 1. Both SAS and R code are being used in this analysis. SAS Proc SQL for the initial cohort creation and claims pull. R code for subsequent analytical dataset creation, analyses, figures, etc.,

Order

1. Cross_Sectional_Cohorts.sas
2. Panel_Cohorts.sas
3. Pull_Cohorts_Claims.sas

R Code:
4. Monthly_Cohorts.R
5. Monthly_Analyses.R
6. Heterogeneity_Analyses.R
7. Event_Studies.R
